sprache.aeskey2: The AES key is needed to crypt sensible data like FTP Passwords. Make sure it is a very secure string.
sprache.aeskey3: Safe this key. If you loose it all crypted data will be lost.
sprache.captcha: Use a Captcha at the login:
sprache.data: Please fill out following data fields. All are required:
sprache.email2: This email will be used when sending data to the users.
sprache.error_database: Error: Can not estblish a connection to the database:
sprache.error_htaccess: Notice: The ".htaccess" file can not be found. Make sure you secure your files and folders properly.
sprache.error_keys1: Error: Can not read files in the "keys" folder! Please correct your permissions first.
sprache.error_keys2: Error: Can not create the "keys" folder! Please correct your permissions first.
sprache.error_quakestat: Error: Can not find or access "/usr/bin/quakestat".
sprache.error_ssh2: Error: The SSH2 functions are not available. Please install them.
sprache.error_stuff1: Error: Can not create files in the "stuff" folder! Please correct your permissions first.
sprache.error_stuff2: Error: Can not create the "stuff" folder! Please correct your permissions first.
sprache.faillogins: Possible failed Logins in a row
sprache.finished: The installation has been completed. Please remove the "install" directory.
sprache.image_server2: If a masterinstallation is not set up the data will be downloaded from this server.
sprache.informations: Following informations must be send to license@easy-wi.com in order to get your licence file:
sprache.prefix2: If you define a username the users unique ids will be appended to the defined name. Only small letters and numbers are allowed. Example: customer will be customer2 and counting
sprache.step1b: Check permissions, functions and enter SQL data
sprache.title: Homepage title
